name: Fluffy FluFarts
description:
Transmit your bird flu and fight other strains of disease.

Shoot enemies. Main objective is to shoot big bird. Also you can shoot humans to infect them with your virus and respawn in their body.

Controls: Keyboard P1: W,S,A,D Keyboard P2: Arrows

 or

 Gamepad Controlls - Left Stick for moving, right stick for aiming.

press "s" button on keyboard to start, 

press xbox controller start button to restart.
